item.description:
In this interactive workshop you will gain insights into how to succeed in cross-organizational collaboration. You will leave the workshop with a few powerful communication skills for resolving partnership breakdowns when they occur. You will learn -

Limiting perception model - Gain insight into how individual and group judgments and interpretations get in the way of effective and empowering communication.
Straight talk - Proactively raise issues in a way that separates perceptions from facts and engages the underlying commitments of both parties leading to effective problem solving. For more information click here.


Speaker:
D. Mark Fourman, Lead Consultant, Unify Consulting

Event Champion:
Joyce Chiu, Senior Project Leader, Sperian Protection, now part of Honeywell, Smithfield, RI


Date: November 17, 2010
Time: 5:30 pm
Location: Rebecca's Cafe, 275 Grove Street, Newton (Auburndale), MA
Info: Judy Isaacson
judy@vitalnow.net
item.name: Successful Partnering: Crossing Organizational & Geographic Boundaries
